name: From Earth to Earth - Beta
description:
Tested and working on Google Chrome and Firefox (had visual issues on Microsoft Edge).

Known bug: Water resistant blocks (gray blocks) are degraded by rain while being carried. If disappearing while held the collider will behave as it still was there. At this point you probably will need to restart the level by pressing 'R'.

Controls (this information can be accessed in game using 'H' button)

JumpUp arrowPick up/throw blockSpaceMake block from mudSpacePut down blockDown arrow + SpaceScroll textDown arrowRestart levelRSpeed up rainfallPBack to menuEscapeShow helpH
